en.description: Here you can create new account with your email address and password.

alerts.email-in-use: Email is already in use. Please choose another one.
alerts.too-many-requests: Too many requests. Please try again later.

sl.description: Tukaj lahko ustvarite nov račun z vašim email naslovom in geslom.

alerts.email-in-use: Email je že v uporabi. Prosimo izberite drugega.
